scripts.build-all: npm -w @summer-js/summer run build && npm -w @summer-js/typeorm run build && npm -w @summer-js/test run build && npm -w @summer-js/swagger run build
scripts.pubulish-all: npm -w @summer-js/cli run release && npm -w @summer-js/summer run release && npm -w @summer-js/test run release && npm -w @summer-js/swagger run release && npm -w @summer-js/typeorm run release && npm -w create-summer run release
scripts.unpublish-all: npm unpublish @summer-js/cli@0.0.4 && npm unpublish @summer-js/summer@0.0.4 && npm unpublish @summer-js/test@0.0.4 && npm unpublish @summer-js/swagger@0.0.4 && npm unpublish @summer-js/typeorm@0.0.4 && npm unpublish create-summer@1.0.3
